"Punish the Forest Hooligans!":
"Have you heard, meow? There is a really
violent thing in the Forest causing
trouble for everyone! If I can beat that
thing I'm sure that my popularity with
the ladies will mew, mew, move way
up... Err, Uh, I mean! For world peace,
will you come and beat that thing with
me?
*Clear with an S Rank traveling
only with Kuro"
